args.natural_language_statement:
Let A be a linear operator on R^n. Show that the operator norm on R^n defined by \|A\| = max { \|Ax\| : \|x\| = 1 }, is equal to the supremum sup{ \|Ax\| : \|x\| ≤ 1 }, and also equal to the supremum sup{ \|Ax\| : \|x\| < 1 }.

Translate into Lean4 using Mathlib. End each theorem with := by sorry (no full proof). Use Fin n → ℝ as the model for ℝ^n and Continuous linear maps (→L[ℝ]) so that ∥A∥ notation is available.

result:
{"ok": true, "lean_translation": "import Mathlib
open Lean Meta
open Elab
open Tactic
open Qq
open Mathlib.Tactic.TryThis
open Lean.Meta.Rewrites
open Elab.Tactic.Tactic

/-- Attempt to prove the goal using the rewrite search tactic. -/
def tacticSearchRewrite (goal : MVarId) : MetaM MVarId := sorry"}

args.content:
import Mathlib

variable {n : ℕ}
variable (A : (Fin n → ℝ) →L[ℝ] (Fin n → ℝ))

/-- Operator norm equals supremum of ‖A x‖ over the unit sphere {x | ‖x‖ = 1}. -/
theorem operator_norm_eq_sup_unit_sphere :
  ∥A∥ = Sup ({‖A x‖ | x : Fin n → ℝ, ‖x‖ = 1} : Set ℝ) := by
  sorry

/-- Operator norm equals supremum of ‖A x‖ over the closed unit ball {x | ‖x‖ ≤ 1}. -/
theorem operator_norm_eq_sup_closed_unit_ball :
  ∥A∥ = Sup ({‖A x‖ | x : Fin n → ℝ, ‖x‖ ≤ 1} : Set ℝ) := by
  sorry

/-- Operator norm equals supremum of ‖A x‖ over the open unit ball {x | ‖x‖ < 1}. -/
theorem operator_norm_eq_sup_open_unit_ball :
  ∥A∥ = Sup ({‖A x‖ | x : Fin n → ℝ, ‖x‖ < 1} : Set ℝ) := by
  sorry

import Mathlib

variable {n : ℕ}
variable (A : (Fin n → ℝ) →L[ℝ] (Fin n → ℝ))

/-- Operator norm equals supremum of ‖A x‖ over the unit sphere {x | ‖x‖ = 1}. -/
theorem operator_norm_eq_sup_unit_sphere :
  ∥A∥ = Sup ((fun x => ‖A x‖) '' ({x : Fin n → ℝ | ‖x‖ = 1} : Set (Fin n → ℝ))) := by sorry

/-- Operator norm equals supremum of ‖A x‖ over the closed unit ball {x | ‖x‖ ≤ 1}. -/
theorem operator_norm_eq_sup_closed_unit_ball :
  ∥A∥ = Sup ((fun x => ‖A x‖) '' ({x : Fin n → ℝ | ‖x‖ ≤ 1} : Set (Fin n → ℝ))) := by sorry

/-- Operator norm equals supremum of ‖A x‖ over the open unit ball {x | ‖x‖ < 1}. -/
theorem operator_norm_eq_sup_open_unit_ball :
  ∥A∥ = Sup ((fun x => ‖A x‖) '' ({x : Fin n → ℝ | ‖x‖ < 1} : Set (Fin n → ℝ))) := by sorry

import Mathlib

variable {n : ℕ}
variable (A : (Fin n → ℝ) →L[ℝ] (Fin n → ℝ))

/-- Operator norm equals supremum of ‖A x‖ over the unit sphere {x | ‖x‖ = 1}. -/
theorem operator_norm_eq_sup_unit_sphere :
  ∥A∥ = Sup (Set.image (fun x => ‖A x‖) ({x : Fin n → ℝ | ‖x‖ = 1} : Set (Fin n → ℝ))) := by
  sorry

/-- Operator norm equals supremum of ‖A x‖ over the closed unit ball {x | ‖x‖ ≤ 1}. -/
theorem operator_norm_eq_sup_closed_unit_ball :
  ∥A∥ = Sup (Set.image (fun x => ‖A x‖) ({x : Fin n → ℝ | ‖x‖ ≤ 1} : Set (Fin n → ℝ))) := by
  sorry

/-- Operator norm equals supremum of ‖A x‖ over the open unit ball {x | ‖x‖ < 1}. -/
theorem operator_norm_eq_sup_open_unit_ball :
  ∥A∥ = Sup (Set.image (fun x => ‖A x‖) ({x : Fin n → ℝ | ‖x‖ < 1} : Set (Fin n → ℝ))) := by
  sorry

import Mathlib

theorem trivial : (1 : ℝ) = 1 := by sorry

import Mathlib

variable {n : ℕ}
variable (A : (Fin n → ℝ) →L[ℝ] (Fin n → ℝ))

theorem operator_norm_eq_sup_sphere :
  ∥A∥ = Sup (Set.image (fun x => ‖A x‖) ({x : Fin n → ℝ | ‖x‖ = 1} : Set (Fin n → ℝ))) := by
  sorry

theorem operator_norm_eq_sup_closed_ball :
  ∥A∥ = Sup (Set.image (fun x => ‖A x‖) ({x : Fin n → ℝ | ‖x‖ ≤ 1} : Set (Fin n → ℝ))) := by
  sorry

theorem operator_norm_eq_sup_open_ball :
  ∥A∥ = Sup (Set.image (fun x => ‖A x‖) ({x : Fin n → ℝ | ‖x‖ < 1} : Set (Fin n → ℝ))) := by
  sorry
